label.phrase: get the facts on the board's 4 billion takeover plan the board of supervisors could issue bonds in any amount to take over pg amp e without a vote of the people giving city politicians a virtual blank check the city would lose more than 20 million a year which pg amp e pays in taxes and fees so our taxes would need to go up or basic services would need to be cut our utility rates would increase more than 400 per year for 30 years the november election is shaping up to be the most expensive ever for san franciscans we simply can't afford the board's takeover
